import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

intel_stock = pd.read_csv('../input/intel-stock-prices-historical-data-intc/INTC.csv')
amd_stock = pd.read_csv('../input/amd-stock-prices-historical-data/AMD.csv')

intel_stock.head(1)
source.bda888a8:
amd_old_processors = pd.read_csv('../input/intel-and-amd-processors/amd_archive_processors.csv')
amd_new_processors = pd.read_csv('../input/intel-and-amd-processors/amd_processors.csv')
intel_processors = pd.read_csv('../input/intel-and-amd-processors/intel_ark_processors.csv')

amd_old_processors['launch_date']=(amd_old_processors.first_mention_year.apply(str) + '-06-15')
amd_old_processors = amd_old_processors.drop(columns=['first_mention_year'])

amd_processors = pd.concat([amd_old_processors, amd_new_processors],axis=0)

amd_processors.columns
source.0fa90dd6:
amd_stats = amd_processors.groupby(amd_processors['launch_date'].str[0:4]).agg(
    launched_models=('id', 'count'), 
    max_cores=('cores', 'max'), 
    min_lit=('lithography', 'min'),
    max_lit=('lithography', 'max'),
    min_tdp=('tdp', 'min'),
    max_tdp=('tdp', 'max'),
    max_frequency=('base_frequency', 'max'),
    max_mem_speed=('max_memory_speed', 'max'))

amd_stats
